generated.css: html{scroll-padding:10px}main{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:center;align-items:center;height:100vh}div.grid_container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:minmax(225px,20%) 1fr;gap:1rem;width:100%;height:100%}div.sidebar{display:flex;flex-direction:column;padding:0 10px;background:#e8e8e8}div.sidebar div:last-of-type{position:sticky;top:0}div.sidebar div.lets_connect{display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:space-evenly;align-content:center;height:50px;border-bottom:5px solid #cecece;padding:calc(10px + 2.75rem) 0}div.sidebar div.lets_connect a{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;width:2.75rem;height:2.75rem;color:#000;text-decoration:none}div.sidebar div.lets_connect a:link{color:#000}div.sidebar div.lets_connect a:visited{color:grey}div.sidebar div.lets_connect a:focus,div.sidebar div.lets_connect a:hover{color:#fdff9d}div.sidebar div.lets_connect a:active{color:#000}div.sidebar div.lets_connect i{font-size:2.5rem;transition:all .25s ease-in-out}div.sidebar div.lets_connect i:hover{font-size:2.75rem}div.this_weeks_hot_laugh h2,div.this_weeks_hot_track h2,div.what_im_learning h2,div.what_im_reading h2,div.what_im_watching h2{text-align:center;padding:5px;border:1px solid #f5f5f5;background:#cecece;font-size:1.25rem}div.this_weeks_hot_laugh span.cursive,div.this_weeks_hot_track span.cursive,div.what_im_learning span.cursive,div.what_im_reading span.cursive,div.what_im_watching span.cursive{display:block;font-family:"cursive_flourish",cursive}div.what_im_watching li{font-style:italic}div.this_weeks_hot_track{display:grid}div.this_weeks_hot_track iframe{place-self:center;max-width:100%;max-height:75px}div.this_weeks_hot_track iframe.youtube_iframe{max-height:400px}div.this_weeks_hot_laugh iframe,div.this_weeks_hot_laugh img,div.this_weeks_hot_laugh video{max-width:100%;max-height:200px;border:1px solid grey}div.content{margin-bottom:50px}div.block_quotes,div.content{display:grid;place-items:center}div.block_quotes{width:80%;max-width:800px;padding:1rem;margin:0 auto 50px;border:1px solid grey;border-radius:10px;background:#fff9fb}div.block_quotes p,div.block_quotes span{text-shadow:0 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.07)}div.block_quotes p{max-width:55ch}div.block_quotes span.block_quote--attribution{font-weight:700}div.block_quotes a{font-style:italic}div.hello{display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex-wrap:wrap;width:80%}div.hello p:first-of-type{font-size:3.25rem}div.hello img{margin:0 auto;width:30%;height:30%}div.hello p:nth-of-type(2){font-size:2.25rem}div.hello a.test_performance{display:inline-block;text-align:center;align-self:center;margin:25px 0;border:1px dotted #000;border-radius:15px;padding:5px;transition:background .5s ease-in-out}div.hello a.test_performance p{max-width:25ch;font-size:.75rem}div.hello a.test_performance:hover{background:#000;color:#fff9fb}div.intro{display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex-wrap:wrap;text-indent:3%;width:60%;max-width:55ch}div.intro p:nth-of-type(2){font-size:1.75rem}div.content nav.explore_concise{width:80%;max-width:1102px;margin:50px 0;border:1px solid #000;border-radius:10px;padding:15px;background:#fff}p#explore_concise_menu-instructions{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:space-around;border-bottom:5px solid #cecece;padding-bottom:15px}p#explore_concise_menu-instructions span{max-width:45ch}p#explore_concise_menu-instructions span:first-of-type{align-self:center;padding:15px;border-radius:10px;background:hsla(0,0%,80.8%,.45);font-size:1.25rem}div.content nav.explore_concise div.explore_link_roll{display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:space-evenly;max-width:100%}div.content nav.explore_concise div.explore_link_roll a{padding:15px}div.content nav.explore_verbose{display:grid;grid-gap:1rem;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(250px,1fr));width:clamp(90%,90%,1102px);margin:50px 0}div.explore_item{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;border:1px solid #000;padding:8px;background:#cecece;transition:all .5s ease-in-out}div.explore_item:hover{background:#fff9fb;transform:scale(1.045)}div.explore_item h2{flex-grow:1;text-align:center;color:#252627}div.explore_item p{flex-grow:1;max-width:40ch}div.explore_item p+a{text-decoration:none;font-size:1.25rem;transition:transform .25s linear}div.explore_item a:focus,div.explore_item a:hover{transform:translateY(-5px)}div#my_work{position:relative}p#my_work-current_job_status{position:absolute;bottom:-5px;right:5px;display:inline-block;border-radius:15px;padding:4px;background:#fff;font-size:.85rem;font-weight:700;color:#000;transition:all .25s ease-in-out}div.explore_item:hover p#my_work-current_job_status{background:#00f;color:#fff}@media screen and (min-width:0px) and (max-width:575px){div.grid_container{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr;width:100%;height:100%;place-items:center}div.sidebar{display:none}div.sidebar ul{margin:0;padding-left:20px}div.content{padding:0 5px}div.block_quotes,div.hello_and_intro{max-width:90%}div.hello_and_intro p:first-of-type{font-size:2.25rem}div.hello_and_intro img{margin:0 auto;width:100%}div.hello_and_intro p:nth-of-type(2){font-size:1.5rem}}@media screen and (min-width:0px) and (max-width:1069px){p#explore_concise_menu-instructions{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:center;border-bottom:5px solid #cecece;padding-bottom:15px}p#explore_concise_menu-instructions span:first-of-type{margin-bottom:20px}}@media screen and (min-width:0px) and (max-width:1075px){div.this_weeks_hot_track iframe{max-width:75%}}
